name: Chroma - Style
description:
I've started a community on Deviant Art to share images made with my models/LoRAs! Join here if you are interested!

IF YOU ARE NEW TO STABLE DIFFUSION OR YOU HAVE PROBLEMS WITH MY MODELS, GO HERE: Guide

IF YOUR PICTURES HAVE PROBLEMS, CHECK MY FAQ SECTION: FAQs

RIGHT NOW IMAGES METADATA ARE MISSING AS I'M USING COMFYUI TO SIMPLIFY THE IMAGE GENERATION. I'M WORKING ON A WAY TO FIX THIS USING A CUSTOM NODE.

THE LORA HAS BEEN RENAMED FROM CRT TO CHROMA, BECAUSE PEOPLE WERE CONFUSED BY ITS NAME.

What's this LoRA

This is a LoRA trained on AI generated pictures of cartoons with a CRT filter (made using the Bing Image Creator). My models are not trained to achieve the exact style of their source, but to change the general vibe of the image. They are also fine-tuned on anime models, so they may not work perfectly with realistic ones.

The images in the examples are created using only this LoRA and different models (mainly my custom):

  • https://civitai.com/models/24149

  • https://civitai.com/models/26332

  • https://civitai.com/models/28322

  • https://civitai.com/models/32022

  • https://civitai.com/models/33707

You don't need to specify a word to trigger this LoRA.

Guides

Learn how to create pictures like mine with my step-by-step tutorials:

  • Beginner's Guide

  • Prompting

  • My Workflow

  • Inpainting

If you want to create images with a high LoRA weight, I highly suggest you to check the tutorial.

Support My Work

Check out my Patreon for exclusive content:

https://www.patreon.com/Inzaniak

Do you want a custom LoRA or picture? Check out my commission page:

LoRA and Picture Commissions

If you want to support my work for free, you can also check out my music/art here:

  • Bandcamp

  • Instagram

  • DeviantArt
